FuncDef: This command specifies the value of the IPv4 Type Of Service (TOS) field. When enabled, the NAT64 node ignores IPv6 traffic-class and sets IPv4 TOS to supplied tos-value in the translated IPv4 packet.

ParaDef.Info: Sets the IPv4 TOS to a fixed value the IPv6 Traffic Class and set the IPv4 TOS to a fixed value and ignores the IPv6 traffic class.
